alert.note: Alert for Iberia; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Iberia, northwestern St. Mary and central St. Martin Parishes through 630 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jeanerette, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jeanerette, Sorrel, Lake Fausse Pointe and Glencoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm with instantaneous rates around 2 inches per hour and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin
